British International School Kuala Lumpur Chartered By The British Schools Foundation
Dear {!Contact.Salutation} {!Contact.FirstName} {!Contact.LastName},
Please find attached the ASA Information Booklet for the first term.
This year the children based in the primary campus (Reception - Year 3) will register online as they did last year. Please follow the link below to register. Choose a first, second and third choice for each day. You will have to repeat the process for each child.
Year 4 - 6 will register themselves in class on Wednesday morning. Please discuss the options with your children and ensure that they are prepared to make their selections on Wednesday.
I will be available in my room (4SA) on Tuesday between 3:00 and 4:00pm to answer any questions you may have.
ASA Information Booklet ( https://eu1.salesforce.com/sfc/p/D0000000DDpn/a/D00000004RoE/FYoVodth.k4U_1sY3dkU3cgf5BcW2LS5rZRbcxCPoPs= ) BSKL Foundation & Primary ASA Registration 2013 - 2014 ( https://docs.google.com/forms/d/1G6UurWk4thqfT7ha5Dv4VgtfpWXsfJuZcyZkRmoxdek/viewform )
Best wishes, Sean Allday
